# Elephants

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of the "elephants" package is to provide a dataset involving elephants! The dataset can be used for data exploration and visualization, as well as statistical analysis.


## Installation

The development version of "elephants" is available from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("https://github.com/Reed-Math241/pkgGrpc")
```
## Example


```{r example}
library(elephants)
```
